q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.views

Class NodeView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLabel
            • q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.views.NodeView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants, PTNINodeDTO, PTNIScaleListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlaceView, TransitionView

    public abstract class NodeView
extends javax.swing.JLabel
implements PTNIScaleListener, PTNINodeDTO
    Base Class for the node views. The node's name is displayed in an JLabel nameLabel which is part of the sourrounding Jlabel representing the node.
    Author:
    q8388415 - Massimiliano Brero
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        int iconWidth,
        int iconHeight)
        Parameters:
        id - Nodes id.
        sourceStandardIcon - String Path to node image when in standard state.
        sourceSelectedIcon - Path to node image when in selected state.
        iconWidth - int Image width of node icon.
        iconHeight - int Image height of node icon.

      • getNameLabel

        public javax.swing.JLabel getNameLabel()
        The mail JLabel of the node contains an extra Jlabel for the node's name.
        Returns:
        JLabel Name label for this node thit will be rendered.

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String label)
        We override the inherited method to use it for setting our node's name that will also be displayed on the desktop. Therefore the JComponents name is the same as for the node.
        Overrides:
        setName in class java.awt.Component
        Parameters:
        label - Node and JComponent name.

      • increaseScale

        public void increaseScale()
        Since this class implements PTNIScaleListener this method overrides the given method there. Will increment scale by scaleFactor.
        Specified by:
        increaseScale in interface PTNIScaleListener

      • decreaseScale

        public void decreaseScale()
        Since this class implements PTNIScaleListener this method overrides the given method there. Will reduce scale by scaleFactor.
        Specified by:
        decreaseScale in interface PTNIScaleListener
